message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a method for translation selection in statistical machine translation using a convolutional neural network. This involves encoding the semantic similarity of translation pairs as well as the context containing the phrase in the source language. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.CV (Computer Vision). However, given the focus on natural language processing and machine translation, cs.CL is the most likely category.
